#summary Users reported Vocabuilder as working on these handsets

= Supported handsets =
Vocabuilder should work in any modern phone (less than 2 years old). It was tested and found to work in the following phone models:

*Nokia*

 * E50
 * E70
 * 5700 Music Express
 * 2626
 * N76
 * 6630
 * 9300i
 * N81 8GB
